mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, update_date from board order by bno desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.delete: delete from board where bno = #{bno} and writer = #{writer};
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, writer, view_cnt, comment_cnt, reg_date, update_date) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, 0, 0, now(), now());
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, update_date=now() where bno=#{bno}
